VARIABLE.NAME: ACUTE_REJ_EPI
DESCRIPTION: DID RECIPIENT HAVE ANY ACUTE REJECTION EPISODES PRE DISCHARGE?

VARIABLE.NAME: COD_OSTXT
DESCRIPTION: RECIPIENT PRIMARY CAUSE OF DEATH - OTHER SPECIFY

VARIABLE.NAME: COD2_OSTXT
DESCRIPTION: RECIPIENT CONTRIBUTARY CAUSE OF DEATH 1- OTHER SPECIFY

VARIABLE.NAME: COD3_OSTXT
DESCRIPTION: RECIPIENT CONTRIBUTARY CAUSE OF DEATH 2- OTHER SPECIFY

VARIABLE.NAME: COMPOSITE_DEATH_DATE
DESCRIPTION: Composite Patient Death Date from OPTN or Verified from External Sources

VARIABLE.NAME: FUNC_STAT_TRF
DESCRIPTION: RECIPIENT FUNCTIONAL STATUS-MOST RECENT AT FOLLOW-UP

VARIABLE.NAME: GRF_FAIL_CAUSE_OSTXT
DESCRIPTION: CAUSE OF GRAFT FAILURE OTHER SPECIFIED TEXT

VARIABLE.NAME: PST_AIRWAY
DESCRIPTION: EVENTS PRIOR TO DISCHARGE: AIRWAY DEHISCENCE

VARIABLE.NAME: PST_PACEMAKER
DESCRIPTION: EVENTS PRIOR TO DISCHARGE: PERMANENT PACEMAKER

VARIABLE.NAME: PSTATUS
DESCRIPTION: Boolean Most Recent Patient Status (based on composite death date) (1=Dead, 0=Alive)
